title: Konverge Digital Solutions takes Home Silver for Field Eagle
text:
Field Eagle takes silver at the Channel Elite Awards for Best Mid-Market Solution
 TORONTO, ON, September 16, Konverge Digital Solutions is an innovative custom software provider and now the 2015 Silver winner for Best Mid-Market Solution for the Channel Elite Awards for their field inspection management software product - Field Eagle.
Field Eagle was designed to help organizations (particularly in risk-based industries) with their risk mitigation processes. Field Eagle is a field inspection platform that simplifies and standardizes complex inspections, and automates the reporting process. It is targeted at organizations that must remain compliant with a large number of industry standards and regulations. Field Eagle is designed to handle complex inspections with an unlimited amount of data points and hierarchies. Standards are built into the inspection tool so data is validated automatically, enabling companies to provide their clients with accurate, timely, professional risk-based inspections. Field Eagle reduces the reporting process from weeks to seconds.
"Field Eagle is a hub for all inspection management needs, it was designed to ensure critical inspections are done accurately, thoroughly and risk-free" said Sonia Couto, Konverge's Director of Operations, "Thank you to our supporters, and clients for their helpful feedback and Channel Elite Awards for the honorable recognition'.
Konverge Digital Solutions was honored at the Channel Elite Awards on September 10th, 2015 for placing second at the CDN Channel Elite Awards Gala at the Paramount Conference and Event Venue in Vaughan. Award finalists, industry professionals and like-minded individuals came together to recognize each other's accomplishments. CDN's Channel Elite Awards is an annual award that 'recognizes IT Solution Providers for their innovation, leadership and commitment to creating business value for customers".
Konverge stresses the importance of equality and embraces leadership amongst all members of the team. With an office environment of a 50-50 male to female ratio, Konverge strives to promote female leadership. Konverge Digital Solutions is a Toronto based Custom Software Provider that specializes in developing breakthrough custom software applications for our clients. Field Eagle is a software product Konverge developed to address a need they found in risk-based inspections. Field Eagles' requirements were a collaboration between Konverge and its' clients to find the perfect software product for all inspection needs. Konverge will continue to develop and upgrade Field Eagle to meet changing needs and adaptations.
